channel.title: Andrewlock.net on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Andrewlock.net on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Introducing collection expressions in C#12: Behind the scenes of collection expressions - Part 1
item.description: In this post I introduce C#12 collection expressions, discuss the benefits of the unified syntax for refactoring, and show how to use the spread element Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/behind-the-scenes-of-collection-expressions-part-1-introducing-collection-expressions-in-csharp12/

item.title: Conditionally skipping a trigger job in GitLab based on a previous job
item.description: In this post I describe the approaches I explored to conditionally skip a trigger job in GitLab based on a previous job using dynamic pipelines Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/conditionally-skipping-a-trigger-job-in-gitlab-based-on-a-previous-job/
